thread.section_title: Hotel Eugene en Ville - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice
thread.title_full: Nice - Review of Hotel Eugene en Ville, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Tatiana-bassil
title: Nice
text: We stayed there for 3 nights, the staff is very helpful, the location is perfect - although the rooms are a bit too dark (walls are painted in black) and I would recommend asking for a bathroom with door (otherwise you get a curtain which is annoying depending on who you are staying with!) but overall it is a nice hotel, with clean rooms and nice staff !
